recent_runway_mentions: Several new versions of the Neverfull MM will be launching in 2024, including 'Epi Heritage Colors', 'Inside Out', 'Upside Down', and 'Colormania'
The Inside Out Neverfull was featured in a campaign with actress Sophie Turner
recent_celebrity_sightings: Sophie Turner (Louis Vuitton's 2024 Neverfull Inside Out campaign)
collectibility_notes: New versions of the Neverfull MM are being released in September and November 2024
The Inside Out version gives a 'two-for-one experience that you hardly find in the luxury space'
overall_trend_summary: The Louis Vuitton Neverfull MM remains a highly relevant and evolving bag, with multiple new variations being released in late 2024. The Inside Out version, featured in a campaign with Sophie Turner, is being particularly highlighted for its versatility and dual functionality, positioning it as an innovative twist on the classic design.
